title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
notes:
From WineDB:
PROBLEM: The shadow placements may be incorrect. Spot light beams may not appear. Flash light beams may not appear. Ceiling light beams may not appear.

1. In the game folder go to SYSTEM folder and open SplinterCell.ini file with text editor.

2. Find block [D3DDrv.D3DRenderDevice] and add or change (if string exists) ForceShadowMode=1 to ForceShadowMode=0

3. Save edited file.

title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell®
notes: Some textures render black, including floor and character, however look normally when camera turned at a certain angle
Must set Shadow Resolution low, otherwise there'll be lots of random black textures. Everything else is ok.
title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell®

notes: After tweaking SplinterCell.ini ( ForceShadowMode=0 ), the textures / shadows works perfectly. Everything else works out of the box.
title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell®

notes: Edit SplinterCell.ini ( ForceShadowMode=0 ) to enable Projector shadows. The default "buffer" shadows are broken on modern hardware. Can also edit ini-files to enable 21:9 resolutions.
title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell®
